properties.entry: SELECT /* MemberDAO#selectMemberByCode() */ MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_NAME , BIRTH_DATE , DIVISION_CODE , DETAIL_INFO , CONTACT , TEAM_CODE , ACTIVE_STATUS FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEMBER_CODE = ?
SELECT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_NAME , BIRTH_DATE , DIVISION_CODE , DETAIL_INFO , CONTACT , TEAM_CODE , ACTIVE_STATUS FROM MEMBER_INFO WHERE ACTIVE_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT LPAD(MAX(MEMBER_CODE) + 1, 3, '0') AS MEMBER_CODE FROM MEMBER_INFO;
INSERT INTO MEMBER_INFO ( MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_NAME , BIRTH_DATE , DIVISION_CODE , DETAIL_INFO , CONTACT , TEAM_CODE , ACTIVE_STATUS ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE MEMBER_INFO SET BIRTH_DATE = ? , ACTIVE_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_CODE = ?
